Basic UsageÂ¶

Note

To use Api you need to have your Opentopic account slug, username and password.

Opentopic Api Client allow for simple communication with Opentopic Rest Api.

Example: 
>>> from ot_api.api import OpentopicApi
>>> api = OpentopicApi(account_name='account_slug', username='username', password='password')
>>> api.get_channels()
[channel_1, channel_2]
